dialog_text: The trees surround you gently, you can feel the breeze passing through the forest
The forest envelops you, a musky scent in the air. Strings of light filter through dense foliage. Each step feels like a venture into a realm alive with ancient secrets.
The darkened forest unsettles you, prompting a decision to turn back. The unease lingers as you retreat, contemplating a return with a torch
*(Your hands are getting tired, maybe there is a better way to do this)*
*(You feel like one more flower would make you collapse)*
